Vygotskian Autotelic Artificial Intelligence

This webpage intends to list papers related to VAAI algorithms, links to tutorials and workshops, and pointers to existing implementations of VAAI algorithms.

About Agents Papers Background Tutorials

Examples of Vygostkian Autotelic Agents

Language as a Cognitive Tool to Imagine Goals in Curiosity-Driven Exploration

Cédric Colas, Tristan Karch, Nicolas Lair, Jean-Michel Dussoux, Clément Moulin-Frier, Peter Ford Dominey, Pierre-Yves Oudeyer

Note: This paper introduce IMAGINE. An autotelic agent that learns to represent and to target goals with language by interacting with a Social Partner. By internalizing language production it is able to compose new goals during exploration. New goals are generated by leveraging language compositionality.

Grounding Language to Autonomously-Acquired Skills via Goal Generation

Ahmed Akakzia, Cédric Colas, Pierre-Yves Oudeyer, Mohamed Chetouani, Olivier Sigaud

Note: Add note

Language Grounding

Environmental drivers of systematicity and generalization in a situated agent

Felix Hill, Andrew Lampinen, Rosalia Schneider, Stephen Clark, Matthew Botvinick, James L. McClelland, Adam Santoro

Tristan Karch, Laetitia Teodorescu, Katja Hofmann, Clément Moulin-Frier, Pierre-Yves Oudeyer
